titles.title: CB 79 My Lord, What Love Is This
Amazing Love

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
MY LORD, WHAT LOVE IS THIS,
That pays so dearly; that I, the guilty one,
May go free?

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Amazing love, O what sacrifice
The Son of God giv'n for me.
My debt He pays, and my death He dies
That I might live, that I might live.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And so they watched Him die
Despised, rejected. But O, the blood He shed,
Flowed for me.

verse.name: v3
